steps.content: Add more tables by clicking the tab with a ‘+’ icon. By double clicking on the table, it is possible to rename tables. Drag and drop allows you to change the order of the tables. Right clicking enables you to delete the table
Add fields by typing in Field name and Field description (to be reflected on the Dataflow help page). You can choose the field type from the dropdown menu
Once clicked on the Required, the reporter must enter data to that particular field
Primary Key (PK) links the fields in the different tables together
Once clicked on the Read only, the reporter can't change data to that particular field
Manage table and field restrictions (QC rules) from this button
Save a copy of the design schema that you can always revert back to
Add uniqueness constraints (QC rules) to records in a table
Add a row constraint to the defined fields
By switching the toggle from ‘Design’ to ‘View data’ to test a schema design
Prefill a table with data and make it read-only (code lists or reference data)
